mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_layer ( uuid, layer_name, layer_desc, layer_source, fields, publisher_name, wkt, options ) VALUES ( #{uuid}, #{layer_name}, #{layer_desc}, #{layer_source}, CAST (#{fields} as json), #{publisher_name}, #{wkt}, CAST (#{options} as json) )
mapper.update: update user_layer set layer_name = #{layer_name}, layer_desc = #{layer_desc}, layer_source = #{layer_source}, fields = CAST (#{fields} as json), publisher_name = #{publisher_name}, wkt = #{wkt}, options = CAST (#{options} as json) where id = #{id} and uuid = #{uuid}
mapper.select: select id, uuid, layer_name, layer_desc, layer_source, fields, publisher_name, wkt, options from user_layer where id = #{id}
